AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Praetor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in an ancient monastery devoted to martial arts. [PAWN_pronoun] was raised to master various forms of physical combat and extend his physical limitations.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Bully
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew faster than [PAWN_possessive] young peers, and took advantage of the fact. [PAWN_pronoun] was often found bullying the other kids. [PAWN_pronoun] grew out of it... mostly, but was left a bit socially stunted as a result.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Artificis
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: In the core planets of the Xenn Empire, those with a natural talent for building and architecture are put into the Aedificarem, a school and training program established to produce fine architects. [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] childhood learning about various building materials, architecture, and the societies that employed them.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Artifis
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: In the core planets of the Xenn Empire, those with a natural talent for building and architecture are put into the Aedificarem, a school and training program established to produce fine architects. When they graduate, they are given the title of "Artifis", and are among the finest builders and Architects to be found.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naturae
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: In the core planets of the Xenn Empire, those with a natural talent for Science are put into the Laboratorium, the premiere scientific institute of the Xenn Empire. [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] childhood learning all the scientific disciplines and methods, with a heavy focus on biology and ecology.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Scientis
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: In the core planets of the Xenn Empire, those with a natural talent for Science are put into the Laboratorium, the premiere scientific institute of the Xenn Empire. Their graduates are known as "Scientis". Their scientific acumen is unmatched.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Natural artist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was always doodling or sculpting, and [PAWN_possessive] talent quickly flowered into a great natural ability for art, winning prizes at many regional "young artist's" exhibits.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Spacer xenn
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born on the family's moving home - a sublight long-haul cargo cruiser. [PAWN_pronoun] grew up learning to wheel, deal, and steal ("only when necessary!" said pop) enough to keep the ship in spaceworthy condition and delivering cargo on schedule.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Alien fire survivor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Rescued from the edge of a forest fire, [PAWN_nameDef] was taken in and raised by an old farmer and his wife. Though [PAWN_pronoun] never got the hang of farming, [PAWN_possessive] great strength was a life-saver for the elderly Kents...

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Xenn colonykid
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in a small trading post on the outer rims of the Xenn Empire. [PAWN_pronoun] had to learn to carry [PAWN_possessive] weight and keep the colony running from an early age.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Xenn corekid
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born on one of the core ecumenopolis in the Xenn Empire. [PAWN_pronoun] grew up in one of the many arcologies, spending much of [PAWN_possessive] time in the upper-level arboretums.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Xenn digger-kid
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was always playing in the sandbox, or building in the mud, or otherwise finding excuses to make holes in the ground.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Toymaker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] found [PAWN_pronoun] had a natural talent for making delicate items such as small gears, and inscribing beautiful designs. [PAWN_pronoun] has made a name as an accomplished toymaker.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sex slave
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was captured by slavers and sold into sexual slavery. [PAWN_pronoun] was forced to tend the gardens, and do all sorts of lewd acts for [PAWN_possessive] 'owner', but grew accustomed to the otherwise lavish environment, and spoiled as far as labor is concerned.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Xenn lasminer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] operated a laser-mining rig at an advanced asteroidal mining station, and occasionally operated manual equipment when they'd pumped atmosphere into a particularly rich shaft. [PAWN_pronoun] developed a strong back and keen eye with [PAWN_possessive] laser-drill.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Geneticist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a bio-Intellectualer for the Xenn Empire. [PAWN_pronoun] has dedicated [PAWN_possessive] life to unravelling the genome and improving [PAWN_possessive] race... FOR SCIENCE!!!

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Xenn hunter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a professional hunter. Sometimes called to put down manhunters, or guide rich dentists on Safari, [PAWN_possessive] skills as a tracker are only matched by [PAWN_possessive] skill at handling.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Xenguana breeder
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has spent many years breeding reptiles, especially the Xenguana, which requires somewhat special handling due to it's rapid reproductive rate. This experience has given [PAWN_pronoun] a great deal of insight into certain animal behaviours.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Trail blazer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is at the forefront of the effort to expand the Xenn Empire - rushing headlong into the unknown to colonize uncharted worlds and eke out a living.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Desk clerk
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a clerk in an office, filing paperwork, submitting reports. During [PAWN_possessive] downtime, [PAWN_pronoun] would read and study various subjects on the global network through his workstation terminal. This left [PAWN_pronoun] with an unquenchable thirst for knowledge.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Xenn doctor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has taken an oath to devote [PAWN_possessive] life to healing others.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Xenn saucier
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a saucier, a master chef who specializes in sauces, stews, hot hors d'œuvres, and sautés. [PAWN_pronoun] has helped prepare meals for some of the highest functionaries in Xenn society.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Xenn pack alpha
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] bears the burden of leadership among [PAWN_possessive] community. Xenn often form tight-knit tribal groups, centered around an Alpha- who is generally the most fit, capable, and wise among the group. Among [PAWN_possessive] peers, [PAWN_nameDef] is that leader.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Army private
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a rank-and-file soldier for the Xenn Empire. [PAWN_pronoun] had served [PAWN_possessive] term of service without incident.... until now.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Army major
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is an officer for the Xenn Empire's army. [PAWN_pronoun] is responsible for the soldiers under [PAWN_possessive] command, and takes that duty seriously.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Space trader
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a free-trader, roving the Xenn Empire and it's neighbors space searching for deals and opportunities for profit. Until now, HE was flying a ship, making deals with colonies like these... I wonder what happened?

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Space cowboy
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is something of a bounty hunter, often called "cowboys" in the Xenn Empire. Historians claim that this moniker comes from the an ancient entertainment program that took the empire by storm, rather than Earth's "old west".History aside, [PAWN_nameDef] is not to be taken lightly... or at all.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Terminator
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has travelled through time to assassinate a specific target... [PAWN_pronoun] is fond of telling people that [PAWN_pronoun] will 'be back'.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Retired commando
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] used to be one of the most elite soldiers in the Xenn empire. Now [PAWN_pronoun] is retired... though [PAWN_possessive] former commander is always trying to get [PAWN_pronoun] back. Some time ago, [PAWN_pronoun] had to rescue a daughter from some druglords. Scary stuff. [PAWN_pronoun] didn't kill Sully last.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Ranger
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a 'lawman' in a dusty Rim colony. [PAWN_possessive] preference for working alone and constant 'bending' of the rules earned [PAWN_pronoun] the nickname "Lone Wolf McQuade". [PAWN_pronoun] ran afoul of some corrupt military officials running weapons to some drug-lords. Many bullets later, [PAWN_pronoun] ended up taking out the mastermind. Stirring the pot so much probably landed them out here...

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Xenn barbarian
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was captured after a battle on a medieval world, and forced to train as a pit-fighter. After crushing [PAWN_possessive] enemies, seeing them driven before [PAWN_pronoun], and hearing the lamentation of their women, [PAWN_pronoun] was released from captivity. [PAWN_pronoun] now seems to be seeking 'two snakes' or something?

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Navy chef
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] used to be one of the top Space Marines special forces officers. Now [PAWN_pronoun]'s 'just' a cook... who can kill you nine different ways with just a pinky. [PAWN_pronoun] sometimes has knife-fights with Tommy-Lee Jones.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Xenn temporal-physicist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] claims to have invented a device that allows [PAWN_pronoun] to travel through time. Apparently after falling and striking [PAWN_possessive] head on the toilet. [PAWN_pronoun] keeps muttering something about misplacing a 'Duh-Lorian'- whatever that is.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Xenn programmer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has spent many sleepless nights hammering away at a console (not literally with a hammer - though sometimes [PAWN_pronoun] wanted to). This allowed [PAWN_pronoun] to fund [PAWN_possessive] second passion... Firearms. [PAWN_pronoun] would vent [PAWN_possessive] frustrations at the shooting range as often as [PAWN_pronoun] could.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Xenn kingpin
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] built a drug empire with brawns, brains, and a fair share of ruthlessness. [PAWN_pronoun] made a fortune, which attracted the attention of [PAWN_possessive] rivals. They struck [PAWN_possessive] base of operation with Police raids, staged by crooked cops on their payroll. Now [PAWN_pronoun] is out for revenge...
